sqls.sql: select * from AT_INT_SAP_VENDOR_LOG where 1=1 <#if address1_s??> and Address1_S=:address1_s </#if> <#if buyerid_s??> and BuyerId_S=:buyerid_s </#if> <#if buyername_s??> and BuyerName_S=:buyername_s </#if> <#if cdate_s??> and CDate_S=:cdate_s </#if> <#if ctime_s??> and CTime_S=:ctime_s </#if> <#if companycode_s??> and CompanyCode_S=:companycode_s </#if> <#if contactor_s??> and Contactor_S like:contactor_s </#if> <#if dummy1_s??> and Dummy1_S=:dummy1_s </#if> <#if dummy2_s??> and Dummy2_S=:dummy2_s </#if> <#if dummy3_s??> and Dummy3_S=:dummy3_s </#if> <#if dummy4_s??> and Dummy4_S=:dummy4_s </#if> <#if email_s??> and Email_S like:email_s </#if> <#if fax_s??> and Fax_S like:fax_s </#if> <#if postalcode_s??> and Postalcode_S=:postalcode_s </#if> <#if pur_org_s??> and Pur_org_S like:pur_org_s </#if> <#if remark_s??> and Remark_S=:remark_s </#if> <#if status_s??> and Status_S=:status_s </#if> <#if suppliercode_s??> and SupplierCode_S like:suppliercode_s </#if> <#if suppliername_s??> and SupplierName_S like:suppliername_s </#if> <#if suppliernick_s??> and SupplierNick_S=:suppliernick_s </#if> <#if supplier_name_en_s??> and Supplier_Name_En_S=:supplier_name_en_s </#if> <#if supplier_name_th_s??> and Supplier_Name_Th_S=:supplier_name_th_s </#if> <#if supplier_nick_en_s??> and Supplier_Nick_En_S=:supplier_nick_en_s </#if> <#if supplier_nick_th_s??> and Supplier_Nick_Th_S=:supplier_nick_th_s </#if> <#if start_time?? && end_time??> and SYNCHRONOUS_TIME_T between TO_DATE(:start_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:end_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if start_time?? && !end_time??> and SYNCHRONOUS_TIME_T > TO_DATE(:start_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if !start_time?? && end_time??> and SYNCHRONOUS_TIME_T < TO_DATE(:end_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if taxid_s??> and TaxId_S=:taxid_s </#if> <#if tel1_s??> and Tel1_S like:tel1_s </#if> <#if udate_s??> and UDate_S=:udate_s </#if> <#if utime_s??> and Utime_S=:utime_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by SYNCHRONOUS_TIME_T desc </#if>

select count(1) from AT_INT_SAP_VENDOR_LOG where 1=1 <#if address1_s??> and Address1_S=:address1_s </#if> <#if buyerid_s??> and BuyerId_S=:buyerid_s </#if> <#if buyername_s??> and BuyerName_S=:buyername_s </#if> <#if cdate_s??> and CDate_S=:cdate_s </#if> <#if ctime_s??> and CTime_S=:ctime_s </#if> <#if companycode_s??> and CompanyCode_S=:companycode_s </#if> <#if contactor_s??> and Contactor_S like:contactor_s </#if> <#if dummy1_s??> and Dummy1_S=:dummy1_s </#if> <#if dummy2_s??> and Dummy2_S=:dummy2_s </#if> <#if dummy3_s??> and Dummy3_S=:dummy3_s </#if> <#if dummy4_s??> and Dummy4_S=:dummy4_s </#if> <#if email_s??> and Email_S like:email_s </#if> <#if fax_s??> and Fax_S like:fax_s </#if> <#if postalcode_s??> and Postalcode_S=:postalcode_s </#if> <#if pur_org_s??> and Pur_org_S like:pur_org_s </#if> <#if remark_s??> and Remark_S=:remark_s </#if> <#if status_s??> and Status_S=:status_s </#if> <#if suppliercode_s??> and SupplierCode_S like:suppliercode_s </#if> <#if suppliername_s??> and SupplierName_S like:suppliername_s </#if> <#if suppliernick_s??> and SupplierNick_S=:suppliernick_s </#if> <#if supplier_name_en_s??> and Supplier_Name_En_S=:supplier_name_en_s </#if> <#if supplier_name_th_s??> and Supplier_Name_Th_S=:supplier_name_th_s </#if> <#if supplier_nick_en_s??> and Supplier_Nick_En_S=:supplier_nick_en_s </#if> <#if supplier_nick_th_s??> and Supplier_Nick_Th_S=:supplier_nick_th_s </#if> <#if start_time?? && end_time??> and SYNCHRONOUS_TIME_T between TO_DATE(:start_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:end_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if start_time?? && !end_time??> and SYNCHRONOUS_TIME_T > TO_DATE(:start_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if !start_time?? && end_time??> and SYNCHRONOUS_TIME_T < TO_DATE(:end_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if taxid_s??> and TaxId_S=:taxid_s </#if> <#if tel1_s??> and Tel1_S like:tel1_s </#if> <#if udate_s??> and UDate_S=:udate_s </#if> <#if utime_s??> and Utime_S=:utime_s </#if>
